name: Sribiriz
content: Sribiriz was a Culisetto male and the brother of warlord and droid mechanic Cribiriz Idollax. One day, before 9 BBY, Sribiriz told his brother he was going to report his crimes to the authorities. Therefore, Cribiriz decided to change his ways and to stop being a criminal. On that same day, Deva Lompop hired a group of bounty hunters, including the infamous Zuckuss and 4-LOM, to kill the Culisetto warlord, who, in her opinion, was becoming a threat. After breaking into Idollax's facility, Zuckuss and 4-LOM found Sribiriz and, mistaking him for his brother, shot him, killing him, while Cribiriz, hidden, watched. Doctor Idollax then swore revenge against the murderers of his brother and went into hiding from the rest of the galaxy.
